title: Making Email Safer for Business – Mimecast at IP EXPO Europe
text:
Making Email Safer for Business – Mimecast at IP EXPO Europe 
Mimecast to discuss email security trends and Office 365 migration challenges at IP EXPO Europe 2015 - Stand #CC19 September 30, 2015 12:40 PM Eastern Daylight Time 
LONDON--( BUSINESS WIRE )--Mimecast will be presenting at this year's IP EXPO Europe – helping delegates explore the risks surrounding on-premises and Office 365 email infrastructure. 
The conference takes place on 7-8 October 2015 at ExCel, London. Mimecast will also be exhibiting on stand #CC19 in the Cyber Security Europe section of the show. 
Orlando Scott-Cowley, Cyber Security Strategist at Mimecast, commented, “ Innocent-looking emails are increasingly at the heart of cybercrime and IT leaders need to re-evaluate their approach to this business-critical service . Additional layers of technology, combined with new employee awareness programmes, are now necessary to address this business challenge.” 
Orlando will be presenting each day. Join him at the following times: Wednesday 7th October - 1:00pm - 1:30pm in the Network & Cloud Infrastructure Theatre Office 365: Risk or Reward? Or Both Thursday 8th October - 1:40pm - 2:10pm in the Cyber Threat Protection Theatre What's stopping you being the next big data breach? 
With six top IT events under one roof, 300+ exhibitors and 300+ free to attend seminar sessions, IP EXPO Europe is the must-attend IT event of the year for CIOs, heads of IT, security specialists, heads of insight and tech experts. 
Register for the event free here. 
About Mimecast 
Mimecast makes business email and data safer for more than 14,500 customers and millions of employees worldwide. Founded in 2003, the company's next-generation cloud-based security, archiving and continuity services protect email, and deliver comprehensive email risk management in a single, fully-integrated subscription service. Mimecast reduces email risk and the complexity and cost of managing the array of point solutions traditionally used to protect email and its data. For customers that have migrated to cloud services like Microsoft Office 365, Mimecast mitigates single vendor exposure by strengthening security coverage, combating downtime and improving archiving. 
Mimecast Email Security protects against malware, spam, advanced phishing and other emerging attacks, while preventing data leaks. Mimecast Mailbox Continuity enables employees to continue using email during planned and unplanned outages. Mimecast Enterprise Information Archiving unifies email, file and instant messaging data to support e-discovery and give employees fast access to their personal archive via PC, Mac and mobile apps.
